column4: Hi, i have a strange problem with my wlan. it connect 3 times to my wlan router, and disconnects after a couple of minutes all connections
but i only have one configured connection
if you gor access to your router then reset it
the reason i say is because i dont know what network you have or how many computers you got connected to the ap
its a rtl8192ce crap onboard laptop chipset
are you connecting to a secured or unsecured ap?
because you can try to run dhclient from the command line to connect
dhclient wlan0      .... whatever your winterface is.
I suppose the iwconfig already has the essid set to whatever the routers broadcast name is
so dhclient wlan0   ....that should connect if not then run ifconfig wlan0 down
dhclient wlan0 gets the same ip, without delay
